name: Support Groups
description: All groups are meeting via Zoom. ​Their support groups provide a private place for individuals to discuss their experiences, share ideas and provide support to one another. BACC groups and activities are voluntary associations of social support and are meant to encourage and inspire one another. All of their support groups are listed below. ​ Please contact their Helpline at 650-326-6686 or info@bayareacancer.org to complete their Support Group Consent Form (found on their website) before joinin

address: 1511 S. Claremont Street, San Mateo, CA, 94402
